name: Operating Table
specification: Steel frame, padded surface, adjustable tilt/height, lockable wheels.
function: Supports and positions patients securely for surgical procedures, offering stability with fixed legs and precise manual adjustments.
usage: Manually adjust height and sections to fit surgical needs; ensure feet adjustments are secure for maximum stability; position patient safely on padded surface..
maintenance: Sanitize all surfaces after each use; inspect mechanical joints and manual adjustment mechanisms regularly.
warning: Improper adjustment are risk in injury may compromise surgical access or patient safety, ensure it is correctly aligned before surgery to avoid patient or staff inconvenience..
